sentences.english: Too many magazines like to feature sleek models on the cover.
sentences.chinese: 太多的杂志喜欢用时尚模特儿作封面。

sentences.english: Yeah, but scented tea is now in fashion.
sentences.chinese: 是的，但现在的时尚是喝花茶。

sentences.english: Eco-fashion has certainly proved that it has enough caché in the fashion world.
sentences.chinese: 生态时装还证明它在时尚界有着足够的影响力。

sentences.english: Visible at that time, contend for effect bookman , furniture of snap up fine wood also is one of vogue.
sentences.chinese: 可见当时，争效文人，争购细木家具也是时尚之一了。

sentences.english: His work partakes of the aesthetic fashions of his time.
sentences.chinese: 他的作品具有当时的某些审美时尚。

sentences.english: Her Louboutin ankle boots provide that high-fashion edge she's become famous for.
sentences.chinese: 她的鲁布托过膝靴提供了她著名的高级时尚感。

sentences.english: Laser battle is fashionably military sport integrated with entertainment and training.
sentences.chinese: 雷战是一种集娱乐和培训于一身的时尚军事体育运动。

sentences.english: Guangzhou Fashion Exchange added credibility through.
sentences.chinese: 广州时尚汇加入诚信通。

sentences.english: Nowadays weight-losing has become popular among young and middle-aged women.
sentences.chinese: 当今女性减肥已成为一种时尚。

sentences.english: Meet 1 & 2 Sofa at the Shanghai InteriorLifestyle exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 壹和贰沙发在上海时尚家居展亮相。

sentences.english: FASHION affects all human activities, and science is not exempt.
sentences.chinese: 时尚影响着所有的人类行为，科学也不能免俗。

sentences.english: The extracted oriental and occidental essence is embodied by a combination of undecorated quality and fashionable elements.
sentences.chinese: 提炼中西精华，不经装饰的特质与时尚元素相结合。

sentences.english: Moreover, fads and fashions come and go.
sentences.chinese: 而且，时尚和潮流总是来来去去，变化不定。

sentences.english: In your opinion,which radio station is the worst? [15:26.64]This clothing store has the most fashionable clothes in the city.
sentences.chinese: 这家服装店有全市最时尚的服饰。

sentences.english: Low profile design, simple fashion, ultra-thin design, convenient operation.
sentences.chinese: 低轮廓设计，简约时尚，超薄型设计，操作方便。

sentences.english: The newly-opened store inherits South Beauty's constant features of fashion and innovation.
sentences.chinese: 新店沿袭了俏江南时尚创新的经营特色。

definition: to return to old ways (a Confucian aspiration)/to turn back the clock/neoclassical school during Tang and Song associated with classical writing 古文/retro (fashion style based on nostalgia, esp. for 1960s)
(Tw) to wear selected items of clothing in combination to achieve a particular look/fashion styling
style (of art or literature)/form/one's work style/moral character
